# Smoldyn surface data file automatically generated by wrl2smol
# input file: tetrahedron.wrl
# output file: tetrahedron.txt

max_panels tri 4

panel tri  -1 -1 1  -1 1 -1  1 -1 -1  tet1
panel tri  -1 1 -1  -1 -1 1  1 1 1  tet2
panel tri  1 -1 -1  1 1 1  -1 -1 1  tet3
panel tri  1 1 1  1 -1 -1  -1 1 -1  tet4
neighbors tet1 tet2 tet3 tet4
neighbors tet2 tet1 tet3 tet4
neighbors tet3 tet1 tet2 tet4
neighbors tet4 tet1 tet2 tet3

end_file
